ProductInfo.Features:
Everything In This Kit Is Brand New Items + Full Usa Warranties
HIGHLIGHTS OF KIT : "0.5x Digital Wide Angle Macro Professional Series Lens" - This 0.45x wide angle attachment more than doubles your camera's wide angle field-of-view.
"2x Digital Telephoto Professional Series Lens" - When your digital camera can't get you quite close enough to the action, this 2x telephoto accessory lens will bring the action twice as close to you.
"High Resolution 3-piece Filter Set (UV, Fluorescent, Polarizer)" - This filter kit contains 3 filters: FILTER UV, FILTER C-PL, F-DL fluorescent light correction filter
